headline: DAT to Acquire the Convoy Platform from Flexport
summary: BEAVERTON, Ore. & SAN FRANCISCO, July 28, 2025--DAT Freight & Analytics has agreed to acquire the Convoy Platform from Flexport, adding best-in-class automation and digital freight-matching technology to its product portfolio.
